name: D-300
description:
This is my submission for WOWIE4 and my first game on itch!

D-300 is a very DUMB AI that needs their gems!

Work together by pressing buttons to open and close doors.

Since I ran out of time, it only has 3 levels and is very short.

I might develop the game further and make better levels for a more complete game in the future; depending on feedback.
